UniqueId.description: Globally unique id of this group

Title.description: The name of the control group. Will be displayed on the control group page and navigation

ApiNamespace.description: ApiNamespace of a control group is not used. Can leave empty

IsSpecialSection.description: Indicates that this section is not a regular control section but is added to the navigation differently

Folder.description: Use to indicate a special child item for this folder. Only used when IsSpecialSection is true

UniqueId.description: Globally unique id of this control

Title.description: Name of this control. Will be displayed in the overview card and on top of the control page of this control

ApiNamespace.description: Namespace of this control will appear below the tile on the control's detail page'

Subtitle.description: Brief usage of this control. Will be displayed on the overview card of this control

Description.description: Description of this control. Will be displayed on the control page, below the Title of this control

UseGlyph.description: If true, use the IconGlyph for determining the icon of the control. Otherwise, use the ImagePath.

ImagePath.description: An image icon of this control. Will be displayed on the overview card of this control. Should be a uri starts with ms-appx:///Assets/ControlImages/...

IconGlyph.description: An image icon of this control. Will be displayed on the overview card of this control if UseGlyph is true. Should be a valid glyph.

UrlName.description: The name of the URL to use for the control. The actual URL will be in the format uwp-gallery:///page/X where X is the value of this property.

IsNew.description: Whether this is a newly added control. If true, it will be displayed in the Recently Added Sample section on the main page and will have a dot on the overview card of this control

IsUpdated.description: Whether the example page of this control has been updated lately. If true, it will be displayed in the Recently Updated Sample section on the main page and will have a dot on the overview card of this control

IncludedInBuild.description: Whether the control should be included in the build.

Title.description: Link name that appears in the Documentation dropdown

Docs.description: Add a link to the doc in the Documentation dropdown on the detail page of this control

RelatedControls.description: Array of names of the related control
